author: Ryan Elliott
releaseNotes:
v0.3.0 - More UI updates. Added rate scheduling.
v0.3.5 - Squashing bugs around variable types. Fixed an issue where state variables were not being populated until the app was opened the first time after installation.
v0.3.7 - Added an option to set which day of the month that monthly reset will happen.
v0.4.0 - Created "Advanced Options" page. Added user verification prompts for rate costs over 1. Added reset and recalculate options.

For further information or to report issues/request features, please see the community thread https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-energy-calculator-plus/108660
